weave.servlets

Interface IWeaveEntityManagementService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminService

    public interface IWeaveEntityManagementService
    Interface for a service which provides RPC functions for retrieving and manipulating Weave Entity information.
    Author:
    adufilie

    • Method Detail

      • getHierarchyInfo

        DataConfig.EntityHierarchyInfo[] getHierarchyInfo(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> publicMetadata)
                                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets EntityHierarchyInfo objects containing basic information on entities matching public metadata.
        Parameters:
        publicMetadata - EntityMetadata containing values to match.
        Returns:
        An Array of EntityHierarchyInfo objects, sorted by title.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getEntities

        DataConfig.DataEntityWithRelationships[] getEntities(int[] ids)
                                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets an Array of Entity objects.
        Parameters:
        ids - A list of entity IDs.
        Returns:
        An Array of Entity objects.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • findEntityIds

        int[] findEntityIds(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> publicMetadata,
                  java.lang.String[] wildcardFields)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets an Array of entity IDs with matching public metadata.
        Parameters:
        publicMetadata - Public metadata to search for.
        wildcardFields - A list of field names in publicMetadata that should be treated as search strings with wildcards '?' and '*' for single-character and multi-character matching, respectively.
        Returns:
        An Array of IDs matching the search criteria.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • findPublicFieldValues

        java.lang.String[] findPublicFieldValues(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                       java.lang.String valueSearch)
                                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Finds matching values for a public metadata field.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The name of the public metadata field to search.
        valueSearch - A search string.
        Returns:
        An Array of matching values for the specified public metadata field.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • newEntity

        int newEntity(DataConfig.DataEntityMetadata metadata,
            int parentId,
            int insertAtIndex)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Creates a new entity.
        Parameters:
        metadata - Metadata for the new entity.
        parentId - The parent entity ID, or -1 for no parent.
        insertAtIndex - Specifies insertion index for sort order.
        Returns:
        An entity ID.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • updateEntity

        void updateEntity(int entityId,
                DataConfig.DataEntityMetadata diff)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Updates the metadata for an existing entity.
        Parameters:
        entityId - An entity ID.
        diff - Specifies the changes to make to the metadata.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • removeEntities

        int[] removeEntities(int[] entityIds)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Removes entities and their children recursively.
        Parameters:
        entityIds - A list of entity IDs to remove.
        Returns:
        An Array of entity IDs that were removed.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • addChild

        int[] addChild(int parentId,
             int childId,
             int insertAtIndex)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds a parent-child relationship to the server-side entity hierarchy table.
        Parameters:
        parentId - The ID of the parent entity.
        childId - The ID of the child entity.
        insertAtIndex - Specifies insertion index for sort order.
        Returns:
        An Array of IDs whose relationships have changed as a result of adding the parent-child relationship.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

        Parameters:

        childId - The ID of the child entity.

        java.rmi.RemoteException
